languages.text: "Нам удалось переправить секретаря Скаландра в медикарий. На поправку уйдет время, однако прогнозы лекарей вполне оптимистичны".

traits.locale_text: "Нам удалось переправить секретаря Скаландра в медикарий. На поправку уйдет время, однако прогнозы лекарей вполне оптимистичны".

languages.text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."
languages.original_text: "Нам удалось переправить секретаря Скаландра в медикарий. На поправку уйдет время, однако прогнозы лекарей вполне оптимистичны".

traits.locale_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. The healers couldn't give a prognosis — even if Achilleas survives, it will take time for him to fully recover."
"We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. The healers couldn't give a prognosis — even if Achilleas survives, it will take time for him to fully recover."
"We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."
"We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."
"We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

languages.text: 「スカランダー長官を医務局に搬送しました。回復には時間がかかりますが、予後は良好だそうです」
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: 「スカランダー長官を医務局に搬送しました。回復には時間がかかりますが、予後は良好だそうです」

languages.text: “我们已经将斯卡兰德秘书送进了医务室。他可能需要一段时间才能恢复过来，但治疗师对他的情况持乐观态度。”
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经将斯卡兰德秘书送进了医务室。他可能需要一段时间才能恢复过来，但治疗师对他的情况持乐观态度。”

languages.text: «Hemos transportado al secretario Scalander al medicarium. Tardará en recuperarse, pero el pronóstico de los médicos es optimista».
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos transportado al secretario Scalander al medicarium. Tardará en recuperarse, pero el pronóstico de los médicos es optimista».

languages.text: « Le secrétaire Scalander a été transféré au medicarium. Sa convalescence sera longue, mais son pronostic semble encourageant. »
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: « Le secrétaire Scalander a été transféré au medicarium. Sa convalescence sera longue, mais son pronostic semble encourageant. »

languages.text: "Wir haben Sekretär Scalander ins Medicarium gebracht. Seine Gesundung wird Zeit erfordern, aber die Prognose der Heiler ist optimistisch."
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Sekretär Scalander ins Medicarium gebracht. Seine Gesundung wird Zeit erfordern, aber die Prognose der Heiler ist optimistisch."

languages.text: "Yazman Scalander'ı sıhhiyeye naklettik. İyileşmesi vakit alacakmış. Neyse ki sıhhiyeciler iyimser bir teşhis koydu."
languages.original_text: "We have transported Secretary Scalander to the medicarium. His recovery will take time, but the healers' prognosis is optimistic."

traits.locale_text: "Sekreter Scalander’ı sıhhiyeye naklettik. İyileşmesi vakit alacaktır ancak sıhhiyeciler iyimser bir teşhis koydu."
